Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Human, RandomAI, SimpleAI, TemplateAI

    abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class for all player, both human and AI

      • turn

        abstract Token turn(Tile[] board,
                    java.util.ArrayList<Token> opponentsTokens,
                    int dice)
        This method is called every time the player can move a token Override this in your AI
        Parameters:
        board - Game board
        opponentsTokens - Tokens of your opponent
        dice - dice result
        Returns:
        Token that should be moved this turn
